meanings.definition: A marine fish of the cod family, found in the North Atlantic.
meanings.sent1: Haddocks swim gracefully in the cold ocean waters.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a delicious meal of haddocks for dinner.
meanings.sent3: Why did the haddocks bring a fishing rod to the party? To catch up with old friends!
meanings.sent4: The haddocks in the sea danced like silver shadows.
meanings.sent5: The sight of haddocks gliding through the water was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this fish as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a flavorful dish using haddocks.
meanings.sent2: I bought some fresh haddocks from the market to cook tonight.
meanings.sent3: The haddocks on my plate seemed to be doing a little dance.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of grilled haddocks filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The haddocks melted in my mouth, leaving a savory taste behind.
